commit.message:
re PR libgcj/26706 ([4.1/4.2] Unexpanded macro in libjava/classpath/configure)

	PR libgcj/26706:
	* aclocal.m4, configure: Rebuilt.
	* configure.ac (GCC_NO_EXECUTABLES): Moved earlier.

From-SVN: r112142
